alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 3:19PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fayette, northwestern Henry, north central Coweta, Clayton and south central Fulton Counties through 345 PM EST ... At 318 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Sandy Creek, or 9 miles northwest of Fayetteville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Hapeville, Palmetto, Lake City, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, Lake Spivey, and Rex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; South Fulton
